languages.text: "Вультур просчиталась, решив, что контроль над маршалом дает и власть над Лекс Империалис. Закон Императора нельзя ни обмануть, ни подкупить, ни исказить".

traits.locale_text: "Вультур просчиталась, решив, что контроль над маршалом дает и власть над Лекс Империалис. Закон Императора нельзя ни обмануть, ни подкупить, ни исказить".

languages.text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
languages.original_text: "Вультур просчиталась, решив, что контроль над маршалом дает и власть над Лекс Империалис. Закон Императора нельзя ни обмануть, ни подкупить, ни исказить".

traits.locale_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
"Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
"Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
"Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
"Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
"Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

languages.text: 「将帥を操れば、レックス・インペリアをも支配できると思った時に、ヴァルターは読み違えた。だが、皇帝陛下の法は欺くことも、買収することも、歪めることもできない」
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥を操れば、レックス・インペリアをも支配できると思った時に、ヴァルターは読み違えた。だが、皇帝陛下の法は欺くことも、買収することも、歪めることもできない」

languages.text: "Vultur hat sich geirrt, als sie dachte, wer den Marschall kontrolliert, kontrolliert auch das Lex Imperia. Das Gesetz des Imperators lässt sich nicht täuschen, bestechen oder verzerren."
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: "Vultur hat sich geirrt, als sie dachte, wer den Marschall kontrolliert, kontrolliert auch das Lex Imperia. Das Gesetz des Imperators lässt sich nicht täuschen, bestechen oder verzerren."

languages.text: « Vultur a commis une grave erreur en croyant qu'elle pourrait contrôler la Lex Imperialis par le biais du maréchal. La loi de l'Empereur ne peut être trompée, soudoyée ou dénaturée. »
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: « Vultur a commis une grave erreur en croyant qu'elle pourrait contrôler la Lex Imperialis par le biais du maréchal. La loi de l'Empereur ne peut être trompée, soudoyée ou dénaturée. »
« Vultur a commis une grave erreur en croyant qu'elle pourrait contrôler la Lex Imperialis par le biais du maréchal. La loi de l'Empereur ne peut être trompée, soudoyée ou dénaturée. »

languages.text: «Vultur cometió un error de cálculo al pensar que controlar al mariscal equivalía a controlar la Lex Imperialis. La ley del Emperador no puede ser engañada, sobornada ni tergiversada».
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: «Vultur cometió un error de cálculo al pensar que controlar al mariscal equivalía a controlar la Lex Imperialis. La ley del Emperador no puede ser engañada, sobornada ni tergiversada».
«Vultur cometió un error de cálculo al pensar que controlar al mariscal equivalía a controlar la Lex Imperialis. La ley del Emperador no puede ser engañada, sobornada ni tergiversada».

languages.text: “沃尔图尔想错了。她自以为控制住了元帅，就等同于掌控了帝国法典，但帝皇的律法绝不会被欺骗、贿赂、歪曲。”
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: “沃尔图尔想错了。她自以为控制住了元帅，就等同于掌控了帝国法典，但帝皇的律法绝不会被欺骗、贿赂、歪曲。”

languages.text: "Vultur, Miralay'ı ele geçirerek Lex İmperialis'i de kontrol edebileceğini sandı ama yanıldı. İmparator'un Yasası yanıltılamaz, saptırılamaz, satın alınamaz."
languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."

traits.locale_text: "Vultur, Miralay'ı ele geçirerek Lex İmperialis'i de kontrol edebileceğini sandı ama yanıldı. İmparator'un Yasası yanıltılamaz, saptırılamaz, satın alınamaz."
"Vultur, Miralay'ı ele geçirerek Lex İmperialis'i de kontrol edebileceğini sandı ama yanıldı. İmparator'un kanunları yanıltılamaz, saptırılamaz, satın alınamaz."

languages.original_text: "Vultur miscalculated when she thought that controlling the Marshal meant controlling the Lex Imperialis. The Emperor's Law cannot be deceived, bribed, or distorted."
